title: ACAlarmExtender (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK ACAlarmExtender IMPLEMENTS
IACAlarmExtender3
, AlarmManager.IAlarmNotifiable
The environment extender function block itself of the alarm generator. It both implements
IACAlarmExtender3
and the AlarmManager.IAlarmNotifiable interface. The latter is used
so that this function block can get the calls of the CODESYS own alarm configuration.

GetID
